entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vernon 10:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Snow level 1400 metres. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 70%
